{{Infobox Artist Discography |Artist = [[Marvin Gaye]] |Image = |Caption = |Studio = 25 |Live = 4 |Soundtrack = 1 |Compilation = 24 |Video = 3 |Video link = Video albums |EP = |Singles = 82 |Music videos = 2 |MV link = Music videos |Tribute = 2 |References = |Ref link = }} {{Portal|Marvin Gaye}} This is a listing of all of the singles and albums released by the [[United States|American]] [[musician]], [[Marvin Gaye]]. Forty-one of his singles reached the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[Top 40]] in the [[United States|US]]; eighteen reached the ''Billboard'' Top 10 and three of them reached #1. ==Albums==
